certificates.title: AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
certificates.description: Completed the AWS Academy Cloud Foundations program, which covers the fundamental concepts of cloud computing and core AWS services. Gained hands-on experience in using AWS to deploy, manage, and scale secure and reliable applications in the cloud.

certificates.title: Smart India Hackathon 2023
certificates.description: Developed a web-based solution for the Smart India Hackathon 2023, aimed at addressing the problem statement on garbage management.
